name: Donut Mess With Dolphins!
description:
Donut Mess With Dolphins is a game about killing flying donut dolphins. as weird as it might sound it's actually a really fun game!

GUIDE:

1X Marble: Does 1 Damage and makes 1 minion of the dolphin.

Potion: adds +30 to your health.

2X Marble: Does 2 Damage and makes 2 minions of the dolphin.

3X Marble: Does 3 Damage and makes 3 minions of the dolphin.

4X Marble:Does 4 Damage and makes 4 minions of the dolphin.

BOMB Marble: does 10 damage and destroys all minions 

X2 attack Damage: changes attack damage by X2

+1 attack Damage: changes attack damage by +1
